name: The mysterious case of Lord Bolton
name_original: The mysterious case of Lord Bolton
description:
As a detective you are trying to solve the mystery about the disappearing of Lord Bolton. Your first clue leads you to his private mansion, but as you step inside, the doors close behind you. Can you find a way out?

Controls:

  • Move - W,A,S,D
  • Look around - Mouse
  • Interact - LMB
  • Show/Hide collected notes - RMB
  • Scroll through notes - Q,E
